instructions:
In a 4 quart saucepan cover sliced potatoes with cold water and add chopped onion and G Washington.
Bring to a boil and cook for 3 minutes. Drain and place potatoes and onion in a 2 1/2 quart buttered
casserole. Dot with 1 tbsp margarine and set aside.
In a saucepan, melt remaining 2 tbsp margarine and stir in flour and cook for a minute or two. Add 1 cup
of milk and stir and cook until it thickens. Add spices and cheese and stir until the cheese is melted. Stir in
½ cup milk and pour over potatoes using a rubber spatula to gently stir and coat potato slices. Add sufficient
of the remaining milk to just cover the potatoes.
Place the uncovered casserole in a 350 F oven for 1 hour or until done.
ingredients: 8 medium potatoes, pared and sliced 1/8 inch
name: Scalloped Potatoes
